mapper.select: select art.art_no,art.art_name,art.art_pic,art.auc_bid,(select mem_name from member_tb where mem_no=#{memNo}) mem_name from art_info_tb art inner join auction_tb auc on art.art_no=auc.art_no inner join art_sell_tb sell on auc.art_no=sell.art_no where bid_top=(select mem_name from member_tb where mem_no=#{memNo}) and sell.art_time < sysdate
